description: Structured information about a file that is not accessible via a URL.
label: Local file
name: LocalFile

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/content._instruction: Enter a short content description for this local file instance.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/content.label: Content description
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/content.name: contentDescription

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/copyOf._instruction: Add the file of which this is a copy.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/copyOf.label: Copy of
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/copyOf.name: copyOf

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/dataTyp._instruction: Add all data types that are specifically represented in this local file instance.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/dataTyp.label: Data type
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/dataTyp.name: dataType

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/format._instruction: Add the content type of this local file instance.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/format.description: Method of digitally organizing and structuring data or information.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/format.label: Format
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/format.name: format

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/hash._instruction: Add the hash that was generated for this local file instance.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/hash.description: Term used for the process of converting any data into a single value. Often also directly refers to the resulting single value.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/hash.label: Hash
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/hash.name: hash

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/name._instruction: Enter the name of this local file instance.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/name.description: Word or phrase that constitutes the distinctive designation of a being or thing.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/name.label: Name
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/name.name: name

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/path._instruction: Enter the file system path (absolute path or relative to the working directory) to this local file instance.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/path.label: Path
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/path.name: path

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/special._instruction: Add the special usage role of this local file instance.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/special.description: Particular function of something when it is used.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/special.label: Special usage role
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/special.name: specialUsageRole

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/storage._instruction: Enter the storage size of this local file instance.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/storage.description: Quantitative value defining how much disk space is used by an object on a computer system.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/storage.label: Storage size
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/storage.name: storageSize
